	equity, held by non-affiliates of the registrant (based upon the closing sale
	price of the registrant&#8217;s Common Stock on the NASDAQ Capital Market tier of the
	NASDAQ Stock Market on June 30, 2015) was approximately $8,425,000.&#160; Shares of
	common stock held by each executive officer and director and by each entity
	that owns 10% or more of the outstanding common stock have been excluded in
	that such persons may be deemed to be affiliates.&#160; This determination of
	affiliate status is not necessarily a conclusive determination for other
	purposes.

<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Forward-Looking
	Statements
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This
	Annual Report on Form 10-K (the &#8220;Report&#8221;), including &#8220;Management&#8217;s Discussion
	and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations&#8221; in Item 7,
	contains forward-looking statements about the business, financial condition and
	prospects of TOR Minerals International, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;).&#160; The actual
	results of the Company could differ materially from those indicated by the
	forward-looking statements because of various risks and uncertainties
	including, without limitation, changes in demand for the Company&#8217;s products,
	changes in competition, economic conditions, fluctuations in exchange rates,
	changes in the cost of energy, fluctuations in market price for titanium
	dioxide (&#8220;TiO
<SUB>
	2
</SUB>
	&#8221;) pigments, interest rate fluctuations, changes in
	the capital markets, changes in tax and other laws and governmental rules and
	regulations applicable to the Company&#8217;s business, and other risks indicated in
	the Company&#8217;s filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, including
	those set forth in this report under Item 1A. Risk Factors.&#160; These risks and
	uncertainties are beyond the ability of the Company to control, and, in many
	cases, the Company cannot predict all of the risks and uncertainties that could
	cause its actual results to differ materially from those indicated by the
	forward-looking statements.&#160; When used in this report, the words &#8220;believes,&#8221;
	&#8220;estimates,&#8221; &#8220;plans,&#8221; &#8220;expects,&#8221; &#8220;anticipates,&#8221; &#8220;foresees,&#8221; &#8220;intends,&#8221; &#8220;may,&#8221;
	&#8220;likely,&#8221; &#8220;should&#8221; and similar expressions as they relate to the Company or its
	management are intended to identify forward-looking statements.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US SIZE="2">
	Non-GAAP
	Financial Measures and Pro-Forma Results
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US SIZE="2">
	The
	Report includes the following financial measure defined as &quot;non-GAAP
	financial measures&quot; by the Securities and Exchange Commission: Adjusted
	EBITDA.&#160; Adjusted EBITDA may be different from non-GAAP financial measures used
	by other companies. The presentation of this financial information, which is
	not prepared under any comprehensive set of accounting rules or principles, is
	not intended to be considered in isolation or as a substitute for the financial
	information prepared and presented in accordance with generally accepted
	accounting principles. Reconciliations of this non-GAAP financial measures to
	the nearest comparable GAAP measures is provided in Note 6 of the consolidated
	financial statements.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US SIZE="2">
	Non-GAAP
	EBITDA includes items such as impairment charges, allowance for doubtful
	accounts, non-cash charges related to inventory impairments and non-cash
	charges related to the disposal of assets.&#160; The Company believes this non-GAAP
	measure provides useful information to both management and investors by
	excluding certain expenses, gains and losses or net purchases of property and
	equipment, as the case may be, which may not be indicative of its core operation
	results and business outlook.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">

<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>

	PART
	I
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<DIV ALIGN=LEFT>
<TABLE CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0 STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH:100%;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="10%" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0.0PT 0IN 0.0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Item 1.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="90%" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 5.4PT 0IN 5.4PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM_BUSINESS">
	Business
</A>
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	General
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TOR
	Minerals International, Inc. (&#8220;TOR&#8221;, &#8220;we&#8221;, &#8220;us&#8221;, &#8220;our&#8221; or the &#8220;Company&#8221;) is a
	global producer of high performance, specialty mineral products focused on
	product innovation and technical support.&#160; Our specialty mineral products,
	which include flame retardant and smoke suppressant fillers, engineered
	fillers, and TiO2-color hybrid pigments, are designed for use in plastics,
	coatings, paints and catalysts applications, as well as a wide range of other
	industrial applications.&#160;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	were organized as a subsidiary of the Benilite Corporation of America
	(&#8220;Benilite&#8221;) in 1973.&#160; In 1980, the subsidiary was spun off to its
	shareholders.&#160; In December 1988, the Company became a publicly owned company
	after completing a public offering of 1.38 million shares of its common stock.&#160;
	Our stock symbol is TORM.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Global Headquarters
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	are headquartered in Corpus Christi, Texas, United States.&#160; This location
	houses senior management, customer service, logistics, and corporate research
	and development/technical service laboratories.&#160; Our financial and accounting
	functions also operate from this location.&#160; Our principal offices in Corpus
	Christi are located at 722 Burleson Street, Corpus Christi, Texas 78402, and
	our telephone number is (361) 883-5591.&#160; Our website is located at
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	www.torminerals.com
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160;
	Information contained in our website and links contained on our website are not
	part of this Annual Report on Form 10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	United States (&#8220;U.S.&#8221;) Operations
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our
	U.S. manufacturing plant, located in Corpus Christi, Texas, is situated on the
	north side of the Corpus Christi Ship Channel and has its own dock frontage at
	the plant.&#160; We also utilize the Bulk Terminal, operated by the Port of Corpus
	Christi Authority, to discharge bulk shipments of Barite from cargo vessels
	directly into trucks for delivery to our plant.&#160; The site has its own railhead
	and easy access to major highways linking it to the rest of the United States
	and to Mexico.&#160; Our products, HITOX
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#174;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	,
	BARTEX
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#174;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	, HALTEX
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#174;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	, OPTILOAD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#174;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160;and TIOPREM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#174;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	, are all produced at this location.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Asian Operations
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	acquired our Asian operation, TOR Minerals Malaysia, Sdn. Bhd. (&#8220;TMM&#8221;), in
	2000.&#160; Located in Ipoh, Perak, Malaysia, close to the port of Lumut, TMM processes
	synthetic rutile (&#8220;SR&#8221;) into HITOX and TIOPREM which are sold primarily in Asia
	and Europe.&#160; The sales team and the quality assurance laboratory for Asia are
	located at the offices in Ipoh.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	made a strategic decision in 2014 to take a portion of TMM&#8217;s SR production
	capacity out of service and during 2015 we supplemented our existing SR
	inventory with SR produced by alternate sources.&#160; After careful evaluation
	throughout 2015, we determined that it was more cost effective to continue
	purchasing SR from alternate sources than to resume production at TMM.&#160; Therefore,
	during the fourth quarter of 2015, we incurred a loss of approximately $2,900,000
	associated with the remaining SR assets.&#160; By making this strategic move, we
	expect cost savings as well as a reduction in our SR costs and inventory levels
	over the next 12 months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	European Operations
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In
	2001, we acquired our European operation, TOR Processing and Trade, B.V.
	(&#8220;TPT&#8221;), situated within reach of the major shipping port of Rotterdam. &#160;TPT,
	located in Hattem, The Netherlands, specializes in the manufacturing of premium
	alumina products ALUPREM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#174;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160;and
	BAYRPREM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#174;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160;for use worldwide.&#160;
	Customer applications, quality assurance laboratory and support facilities for
	Europe are located in Hattem.&#160; Our global headquarters in Texas provide
	customer service and shipping logistics for TPT&#8217;s North American customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLFOOTER4">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV>
<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;LAYOUT-GRID-MODE:LINE;">
	- 4 -
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<HR NOSHADE ALIGN="CENTER" WIDTH="100%" SIZE=2>
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM_PAGE_5">
</A>
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLPAGEBORDER5">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%; PADDING-LEFT: 0%">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLHEADER5">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our Products
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TOR
	and its subsidiaries operate in the business of mineral product manufacturing
	in three geographic segments.&nbsp; All U.S. manufacturing is done at the
	facility located in Corpus Christi, Texas.&nbsp; Foreign manufacturing is done
	by the Company&#8217;s wholly-owned subsidiaries, TMM and TPT.&nbsp; Our products are
	currently marketed in the United States and in more than 60 other
	countries.&nbsp; We sell our products through a network of direct sales
	representatives employed by the Company and independent stocking distributors
	in the United States, as well as distributors and agents overseas.&nbsp; Our sales
	representatives sell directly to end-users and provide technical support and
	market guidance for our independent distribution network.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Below is a list of our
	current specialty mineral products and a brief description of the unique
	characteristics which lend to the high performance of these specialty products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	ALUPREM
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Premium
	Alumina Trihydrate (&#8220;ATH&#8221;) and Boehmite (&#8220;AMH&#8221;) products are produced at our
	European operation and are designed for the most demanding worldwide
	applications. In-house engineered surface treatment is available for enhanced
	performance benefits.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	ALUPREM
	TB and SR Boehmite alumina products are suitable for a broad range of
	applications including wire and cable, catalysts, high-tech polishing, coatings
	and pigments. Performance benefits include high temperature flame retardant,
	improved mechanical properties and scratch resistance, good resin compatibility
	and high brightness.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	ALUPREM
	XHL is specially designed ATH for &#8220;Extra High Loading&#8221; to meet more stringent
	flame retardant and smoke suppressant requirements for sheet molding compound
	(&#8220;SMC&#8221;), bulk molding compound (&#8220;BMC&#8221;), pultrusion and other thermoset
	composite applications.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	ALUPREM
	TA Bayer and TG ultra-white / translucent grade ATH products are designed for
	color critical applications like solid surface and performance driven uses such
	as wire and cable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	HITOX
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	HITOX
	(high grade titanium dioxide) is a high quality, cost-effective, beige colored
	titanium dioxide pigment produced at both our U.S. and Asian operations. In
	products which require opacity and color, HITOX can reduce the amount of
	expensive organic and inorganic pigments as well as white titanium dioxide (&#8220;TiO2&#8221;).
	HITOX is used in a broad range of paint and coatings and plastics applications
	including architectural, coil backers, powder, container, wood, traffic, paper,
	primers, adhesive and sealants, roof coatings and PVC.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	BARTEX and BARYPREM
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	High
	whiteness and brightness, chemical inertness and controlled particle sizing are
	features of BARTEX. Barium Sulfate&#8217;s high density is one of the primary reasons
	it is used as a pigment. Suitable for use in both acid and basic conditions,
	BARTEX gives weight and body to products ranging from powder coatings to rubber
	products and plastics. BARTEX is also used as an extender pigment in top coats
	and primers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	OPTILOAD
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	OPTILOAD
	ATH, specially developed for &#8220;Optimum Loading&#8221;, offers a halogen-free solution
	for passing the most stringent flame retardant and smoke suppressant
	requirements. With increasing legislative concerns over smoke and toxicity
	associated with older halogenated systems, interest in re-formulation with
	OPTILOAD is growing.&#160; Produced at our U.S. operation, the low viscosity
	OPTILOAD series offers high performance in a wide range of thermoset composite
	applications including SMC, BMC, pultrusion, resin infusion and spray-up / hand
	lay-up.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	HALTEX
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	HALTEX
	ATH is an economical, non-toxic, flame retardant and smoke suppressant filler
	produced at our U.S. operation for supply to the North American market. HALTEX
	features tightly controlled particle sizing to meet specific application
	performance requirements. Quality is suitable for a broad range of uses
	including electrical components, SMC, BMC, adhesives and sealants, roof
	coatings, foam insulation and rubber mining belts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLFOOTER5">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV>
<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;LAYOUT-GRID-MODE:LINE;">
	- 5 -
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR NOSHADE ALIGN="CENTER" WIDTH="100%" SIZE=2>
<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM_PAGE_6">
</A>
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLPAGEBORDER6">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%; PADDING-LEFT: 0%">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLHEADER6">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TIOPREM
</FONT>
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TIOPREM
	is a high performance TiO2 colored hybrid pigment produced at both the U.S. and
	Asian operations. TIOPREM offers excellent heat stability making it suitable
	for use in high temperature resins and coatings. Typical applications are
	plastic master batch, color concentrates and liquid color. TIOPREM exhibits
	good opacity and is cost-effective in formulation, partially replacing more
	expensive heat stable pigments as well as white TiO
<SUB>
	2
</SUB>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Raw
	Materials and Energy
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	utilize a variety of raw materials in the manufacturing of our products.&#160;
	Outlined below are the principal raw materials for TOR&#8217;s products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	ALUPREM:
</FONT>
</I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; Alumina trihydrate, the chief raw material for
	ALUPREM, is manufactured throughout the world including Europe and North
	America.&#160; The ATH material used for chemicals, fillers and flame-retardants is
	produced by the Bayer alumina process.&#160; This grade of ATH accounts for
	approximately 95% of the total ATH produced worldwide.&#160; The Company purchases
	ATH from various suppliers in Europe.&#160; The average prices for ATH remained
	stable in 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	BARTEX
	/ BARYPREM:
</FONT>
</I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; High grade barites
	(barium sulfate) are mined in China, India, Turkey and Mexico and are the raw
	materials used to produce our BARTEX and BARYPREM product lines.&#160; The average
	price for this grade of barites remained stable in 2015.&#160; The availability of finer
	grade barites in China are &#160;declining, which could lead to high prices in the
	future.&#160;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	HALTEX
	/ OPTILOAD:
</FONT>
</I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; Bayer grade aluminum
	hydroxide, used to produce HALTEX, is purchased from one of four suppliers
	located in the U.S.&#160; The average price for the Bayer grade aluminum hydroxide remained
	stable in 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	HITOX
	/ TIOPREM:
</FONT>
</I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; Historically, SR, the
	primary raw material used in the production of our HITOX and TIOPREM, was
	manufactured at TMM.&#160; However, during the later part of 2014 and 2015, we
	secured two alternate sources of SR.&#160; As a result of this strategic move, we
	anticipate the price of SR to remain stable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	ENERGY:
</FONT>
</I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; We are highly dependent on energy in our
	manufacturing processes.&#160; Electricity is the predominate source of energy at
	each of our three operations and we also utilize natural gas as a source of
	energy at our U.S plant.&#160; At our plant in Corpus Christi, the average price of
	electricity increased 7% and the average price of natural gas decreased 37%.&#160; At
	TMM and TPT, the average price for electricity remained flat in 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Research
	and Development / Technical Services
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our
	expenditures for research and development and technical services were
	approximately $200,000 in 2015.&#160; We conduct our research and technical service primarily
	at our facilities in Corpus Christi, and our efforts are principally focused on
	process technology, product development and technical service to our
	customers.&#160; There are no research and development costs borne directly by our
	customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</A>
</FONT>

	- 6 -
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Marketing and Customers
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Sales and Marketing Department Organization
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TOR&#8217;s
	sales efforts are managed out of Corpus Christi, Texas, by the Executive Vice
	President.&#160; We have sales offices at our U.S., Asian and European operations.&#160;
	Area and product managers report to the Executive Vice President and assist
	with customer, agent and distributor relations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Independent Distributors and Agents
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0IN;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	utilize a network of both domestic and foreign independent distributors and
	agents.&#160; Within North America there are multiple agents serving us on either a
	regional or a product basis.&#160; In most other countries there is one stocking
	distributor who purchases directly from TOR and resells in their territory.&#160; In
	certain large countries there may be multiple distributors.&#160; Our use of
	domestic and foreign distributors and agents allows us to have the benefit of
	sales specialists with specific trade knowledge in each country.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0IN;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Customers
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our
	end-use customers include companies in the paints, coatings and plastics, as
	well as other industries.&#160; For the year ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, one
	of our customers represented 18% and 23%, respectively, of our total
	consolidated sales.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Geographic Distribution
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	sell our products globally and market them in North, Central and South America,
	Asia and Europe to customers located in more than 60 countries.&#160; For the years
	ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, Germany represented 23% and 25%,
	respectively, of our foreign sales.&#160; Sales to external customers are attributed
	to geographic area based on the country of distribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	A
	summary of the Company&#8217;s sales by geographic area is presented below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<TD NOWRAP VALIGN=BOTTOM WIDTH=42% STYLE="BACKGROUND:WHITE;HEIGHT:13.2PT;PADDING:0IN .85PT 0IN .85PT;">

	Canada, Mexico &amp;
	South/Central America
</FONT>

<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Competition
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	experience competition with respect to each of our products.&#160; In order to
	maintain and grow sales volumes, we must rely on our ability to innovate to add
	value as well as to manufacture and distribute products at competitive prices.&#160;
	We believe that quality, delivery on schedule and price are the principal
	competitive factors.&#160; Due to the nature and the size of our company as compared
	to others in the industry, we are not price leaders, but are price followers. &#160;While
	we generally attempt to increase prices to offset cost increases, these actions
	tend to lag the cost increases.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our
	competitors range from large corporations with a full line of production
	capabilities and products to small local firms specializing in one or two
	products. Recently we have faced competition from a large number of smaller
	Chinese suppliers.&#160; A number of these competitors are owned and operated by
	large diversified corporations.&#160; Many of these competitors, such as E.I. DuPont
	de Nemours &amp; Co., Inc., Kronos Inc. and J.M. Huber, have substantially
	greater financial and other resources, and their share of industry sales is
	substantially larger than ours.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Environmental
	Regulations and Product Safety
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our
	plant in Corpus Christi is subject to regulations promulgated by the Federal
	Environmental Protection Agency (&quot;EPA&quot;) and state and local
	authorities with respect to the discharge of substances into the environment.&#160;
	We believe that the Corpus Christi plant is in compliance with all applicable
	federal, state and local laws and regulations relating to the discharge of
	substances into the environment, and we do not expect that any material capital
	expenditures for environmental control facilities will be necessary in order to
	continue such compliance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLFOOTER7">
</A>
</FONT>

	- 7 -
</FONT>

<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

	&nbsp;

<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM_PAGE_8">
</A>
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLPAGEBORDER8">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%; PADDING-LEFT: 0%">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLHEADER8">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TMM's
	SR plant is required to be licensed by the Malaysian Atomic Energy Licensing
	Board (&quot;AELB&quot;) because the ilmenite used by the plant is derived from
	tin tailings and contain small amounts of monazite and hafnium, which are
	radioactive rare earth compounds.&#160; The monitoring is done in-house by TMM
	personnel and results are reported to the AELB as required.&#160; The plant is also
	subject to various other licensing and permitting requirements, all of which
	TMM is currently in compliance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TPT
	operates an alumina processing plant in Hattem, The Netherlands, and is
	governed by rules promulgated by both The Netherlands and the European
	Community.&#160; We believe that the Hattem plant is in compliance with all
	applicable environmental and safety regulations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Backlog
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	normally manufacture our pigment products in anticipation of, and not in
	response to, customer orders and generally fill orders within a short time
	after receipt.&#160; Consequently, we seek to maintain adequate inventories of our
	pigment products in order to permit us to fill orders promptly after receipt.&#160;
	As of March 7, 2016, we did not have a significant backlog of customer orders.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Seasonality
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our
	business is closely correlated with the construction industry and its demand
	for materials that use pigments, such as paints and plastics.&#160; This has
	generally led to higher sales in our second and third quarters due to increases
	in construction and maintenance during warmer weather.&#160; Also, pigment
	consumption is closely correlated with general economic conditions.&#160; When the
	economy is in an expansionary state, there is typically an increase in pigment
	consumption, while a slowdown in the economy typically results in decreased
	pigment consumption.&#160; When the construction industry or the economy is in a
	period of decline, TOR's sales and profits are likely to be adversely affected.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Patents
	and Trademarks
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We
	currently hold no patents on the processes for manufacturing any of our
	products.&#160; Seven of TOR&#8217;s products, HITOX (4/30/2025), ALUPREM (7/29/2023),
	HALTEX (7/28/2019), BARTEX (2/24/2017), TIOPREM (8/5/2018), OPTILOAD
	(10/27/2019), and BARYPREM (8/30/2016), are marketed under names which have
	been registered with the United States Patent and Trademark Office.&#160; Expiration
	dates are shown in parenthetical phrases following each product in the preceding
	sentence.&#160; Trademarks are also registered in certain foreign countries.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Employees
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	As
	of December 31, 2015, our U.S. operations had 32 full-time employees, our
	European operation had 34 employees, and our Asian operation had 37 employees,
	of which 9 are covered by a collective bargaining agreement with an in-house
	union.&#160; We have not experienced any work stoppages and believe that our
	relations with all of our employees are good.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Available
	Information
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TOR&#8217;s
	internet website address is
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	www.torminerals.com
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160; Our Annual Report on
	Form 10-K, quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, current reports on Form 8-K and
	amendments to those reports filed or furnished pursuant to Section 13 or 15(d)
	of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 are available through our internet
	website as soon as reasonably practicable after we electronically file such
	material with, or furnish it to, the Securities and Exchange Commission.&#160; Our
	internet website and the information contained therein or connected thereto are
	not intended to be incorporated into this Annual Report on Form 10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">

<EFX_RISK_FACTORS>
<A NAME="FIS_RISK_FACTORS"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%; PADDING-LEFT: 0%">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLHEADER9">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN=LEFT>
<TABLE CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0 STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH:100%;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="10%" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0PT 0IN 0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Item
	1 A.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="90%" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 5.4PT 0IN 5.4PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM_RISK_FACTORS">
	Risk Factors
</A>
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In
	addition to the factors discussed in the &#8220;Forward-Looking Statement&#8221; at the
	beginning of this Annual Report on Form 10-K, the following are important
	factors that could cause actual results or events to differ materially from
	those contained in any forward-looking statements made by or on behalf of the
	Company.&#160; In addition, you should know that the risks and uncertainties
	described below are not the only risks and uncertainties that we face.&#160;
	Unforeseen risks could arise and problems or issues that we now view as minor
	could become more significant.&#160; If we were unable to adequately respond to any
	risks, our business, financial condition and results of operations could be
	materially adversely affected.&#160; Additionally, we cannot be certain or give any
	assurances that any actions taken to reduce known risks or uncertainties will be
	successful.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Risks Related to Our
	Business
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We are a company with
	operations around the world and are exposed to general
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<B>
<I>
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	economic,
	political and regulatory conditions and risks in the countries in which we
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<B>
<I>
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	have
	operations and customers.
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	We operate globally and have
	customers in many countries. Our production facilities are located in North
	America, Europe and Asia. &#160;Our principal customers are similarly global in
	scope and the prices of our most significant products are typically regional or
	world market prices. Consequently, our business and financial results are
	affected, directly and indirectly, by world economic conditions, including
	instability in credit markets, declining consumer and business confidence,
	fluctuating commodity prices and interest rates, volatile exchange rates and
	other challenges such as the changing regulatory environment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Failure to comply with applicable
	laws, rules, regulations or court decisions could expose us to fines, penalties
	and other costs. Moreover, changes in laws or regulations, such as unexpected
	changes in regulatory requirements (including import or export licensing requirements),
	or changes in reporting requirements of the U.S., European Union
	(&quot;EU&quot;) or Asian governmental agencies, could increase the cost of
	doing business in these regions. Any of these conditions may have an effect on
	our business and financial results as a whole and may result in volatile
	current and future prices for our securities, including our stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In addition, we have significant
	operations and financial relationships based in Europe. Sales originating in
	Europe have accounted for approximately 23% of our consolidated sales revenue in&nbsp;2015.
	Adverse conditions in the European economy may negatively impact our overall
	financial results due to reduced economic growth and resulting decreased
	end-use customer demand.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT COLOR=BLACK FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Finally, conditions such as the uncertainties
	associated with war, terrorist activities, civil unrest, epidemics, pandemics,
	weather, natural disasters, the effects of climate change or political
	instability in any of the countries in which we operate or have significant
	customers or suppliers could affect us by causing delays or losses in the
	supply or delivery of raw materials and products, as well as increasing
	security costs, insurance premiums and other expenses. These conditions could
	also result in or lengthen economic recession in the U.S., Europe, Asia or
	elsewhere.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Our Malaysian debt is subject to subjective
	acceleration provisions and demand provisions that allow our lending
	institutions to accelerate payment at any time.&#160; If TMM&#8217;s debt was accelerated
	under the demand provisions, our working capital and financial condition would
	be severely impacted.
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	TMM
	has loan agreements with banks in Malaysia that provide short-term credit
	facilities and term loans.&#160; These borrowings are subject to certain subjective
	acceleration provisions based on the judgment of the banks and demand
	provisions that provide that the banks may demand repayment at any time.&#160; We
	believe such a demand provision is customary in Malaysia for such facilities.&#160;
	At December 31, 2015, our Malaysian debt consisted of $1,287,000 under the
	short-term credit facilities and $824,000 under the term loans.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If
	demand is made by the banks, we will require additional debt or equity
	financing to meet our working capital and operational requirements and to
	refinance our maturing or demanded indebtedness.&#160; Should we find it necessary
	to raise additional funds, we may find that such funds are either not available
	or are available only on terms that are unattractive in terms of shareholders&#8217;
	interest.&#160; If this debt could not be repaid or refinanced, the banks could
	foreclose and sell our foreign operations, which would adversely affect our
	financial condition and liquidity.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<A NAME="KMARCH4EDGAR1_HTM__BCLFOOTER9">
</A>
</FONT>
<DIV>
<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;LAYOUT-GRID-MODE:LINE;">
	- 9 -
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE="MARGIN:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:.0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" LANG=EN-US STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

</P>
